summary: A simple Batch file that gives you the Exact amount of materials to build the homes in Hearthfire.
descriptionHtml:
Having tried all the other "Cheat Chest" type mods on Nexus I found myself annoyed at the fact that they were all missing items, added an excess of materials I didn't need, AND added another piece of clutter (Chest) outside my house that would never be used.

I made this simple file to give you the exact amount of materials you need WITHOUT having to install new chests around your homes.

This BAT file includes the EXACT amount of materials to build:
--Entryway--
--Main Hall--
--Cellar--
--Outside Buildings--

"Updated!" Now includes all the Wing Additions in BAT form!

Installation:
Simply put the file in your main Skyrim folder: "C:Program Files (x86)->Steam->steamapps->common->skyrim" (BAT files go in the same directory as your Launcher/SKSE NOT the "DATA" folder)

Once in game, just open your console and type:
"bat House"
(without the quotes) and everything will be deposited in your inventory.

The file DOES NOT include the exact materials for the "Small House", it was made to build from an empty plot of land to a fully furnished Main Hall with Cellar.

It DOES include:
All the Sawn Logs
All the Outside Constructions
All the materials needed to complete The Shrines
All the materials needed to complete Trophies
(You will have a "few" extra materials left over depending on the house, because each house has a unique Outside Building i.e. Apiary, Grinding Wheel, Fish Hatchery)

"Updated!" By request all "Wing Additions" have been added to the main file in separate folders (East, North, West)

<>East Wings<>
Armory
Kitchen
Library

<>North Wings<>
Alchemy Laboratory
Storage Room
Trophy Room

<>West Wings<>
Bedrooms
Enchanter's Tower
Greenhouse

Trophy Room: I have included all the materials to Build and Furnish this Wing, but have not included the materials to furnish all the "Pedestal Statues". There are more Statues than Pedestals available and I would either have to add a lot of "unnecessary" items or choose statues for you and add those items. (I'm not your interior designer, you can gather and place your own Statues to suit your tastes!)
author: Kadyak

files.name: Hearthfire Building Materials with Wing Additions
